video标签隐藏下载按钮

asing1elife | 2018-03-01 | css ， video

通过CSS3的伪类样式强制将video标签的下载按钮隐藏

实现方式

1
2
3
4
5
6
7
video::-webkit-media-controls-enclosure {
    overflow: hidden;
}

video::-webkit-media-controls-panel {
    width: calc(100% + 30px);
}
# css # video
MyBatis抛出You can't operate on a closed Connection!!!
List抛出ConcurrentModificationException
